About MarsColony

Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and the second-smallest planet in the Solar System, being larger than only Mercury. In English, Mars carries the name of the Roman god of war.

exlore Polygon

Settle new Worlds

Settle new worlds. This is main idea that connects our community. Marscolony is all about expanding to new planets, establishing multi-planet societies and governing those planet

Earn pCLNY passively

Earn passive income by holding your land NFT. Each land plot has universal basic income component generating an income in form of pCLNY tokens over the next 21 years. See our tokenomics for details

Evolve colonies & earn

Send avatars to missions and earn rewards. Missions power Colony evolving it and enabling technological advancements such

Become a part of virtual of meta-society

Joine the first meta-society governed by future colonists
